reviews.customers_say: Customers find this dress beautiful and well-made, with a thick, heavy fabric that's flowy and comfortable to wear, particularly for outdoor summer weddings. Customers appreciate its lightweight nature, with one mentioning it doesn't feel super heavy in the heat.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars My new favorite dress
items.body: Comfort, style, flattery- all in one. True bright color and quality stitching. Love that it's lined. The fabric is lightweight and comfortable in the heat, but also has that nice drapping luxurious feel. I was able to find a balcanotte bra already in my closet that fit under the straps perfect. Needed to be ironed on arrival, but was pressed easy. Washes well in normal wash cycle. I only wish there were pockets. Read more
items.author: Annika

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy it, its perfect!!
items.body: 10 stars. Buy this dress. 5’5”. 132 34DD 26 36. This is my favorite dress Pros: -great lower lag length—higher if tall, lower if short, a length that fits everyone -uneven hem is fun -great for evening hot weather, put on a sweater if it’s cool -not too low cut, a very flattering line at top, classy, gently elasticized bodice so works for moderate chest size comfortably with perfect coverage. Don’t know about very large breast but smaller breast would likely be flattering bc of the rounded design at the chest. -elasticized waist comfortable, not too tight. -shoulder straps fit well, don’t fall off -comfortably lined dress -I love the shape fit and comfort of this beautiful dress -good for date night, fun slightly formal daytime gathering or picnic, anything outdoor, wedding or baby shower, wedding or wedding rehearsal, would work in the fall with the right colors and a sweater. -I can’t say enough about it. -I’ll try to update with a few pictures Cons: NONE Read more
items.author: Linnie Poo

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars A beautiful dress
items.body: I bought this dress for my daughter, it looks really good on her! I like the fit and quality. She can wear this in a variety of settings. The fabric is of a good quality and not see through, and it’s true to size but stretchy so if you are sort of in between a S/M or M/L etc, you can size down. The only thing is the straps are adjustible with buttons, and one of hers came off when she tried the dress on. It was no big deal, we just sewed the button back on and reinforced the other button too. So you might want to sew the buttons on more securely (there are only 2, 1 per strap). It’s a beautiful dress, my daughter wears it with dressy sandals, casual flip flops, and white sneakers and it all looks cute. Read more
items.author: Glitchzig

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and comfortable
items.body: This is a very pretty, well made dress. It has a lining and has a nice flow to it with the bottom ruffles. The top part is a little high. It has adjustable straps which made for a good fit without sewing. It was perfect for my daughter's bridal shower. I bought it in the green floral and the color was beautiful and vibrant. I am 5'3"m 123 lbs 34C and the small was perfect. Read more
items.author: judy/niagara falls

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well made and very flattering
items.body: Beautiful, comfortable, flattering, great price point! Read more
items.author: BJStewart

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is a beautiful dress!!!
items.body: I absolutely LOVE this dress. I bought the paisley pattern and it is beautiful. I don’t usually wear a lot of dresses but I kept seeing this in my recommendations and I eventually had to get it. It is truly flattering with my mid-section being my problem area. It is also lightweight and soft, and has a lining underneath which adds to its softness. The elastic waist and bust area is not tight which I also like because it’s doesn’t constrict me. It can be worn with or without a bra which is an added bonus, plus it’s not too long. I’m 5’1 and was concerned about the length. But it hit right above my ankles making it perfect for heels or dressy flats/sandals. I will purchase this style again in other colors. I definitely recommend it. Read more
items.author: Janaki Smith

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Buttons not attached
items.body: The buttons for the straps were not sewn on. Also was a little big for the size. Otherwise very pretty Read more
items.author: Janelle

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice dress just wish they had an x-small.
items.body: Really nice dress. The colors are beautiful. I am 5'9" 115 lbs and the small was a bit too big for me in the waist. I kept it but wish they had an x-small. I had to sleep in it when we were having our house done and it did not wrinkle at all. It is not see through so there is no need to wear a slip under it. It covers my bra strap so that is nice, many don't. It is fairly thick but not so much that I am dying in the Texas heat. No extra threads or seam issues. It seems to be well made. Read more
items.author: David Snyder

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Blue White, Pink Floral, Black Floral, Green Leaf, Pink Yellow Floral, Orange Floral, Purple Floral, Purple Orange, Black, Orange Flower, Blue Yellow, Orange, Green Yellow, Yellow Floral. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
